item.title: Why Google’s Quantum Computer Chip Willow Is A Game Changer
item.description: Google unveiled its latest quantum processor, Willow- transforming quantum computing from technical curiosity to a practical tool.

item.title: Police Install Spyware To Track Android Smartphones In China
item.description: Chinese authorities are installing spyware to track and monitor their citizen's Android smartphones.

item.title: Fake X And Facebook Accounts Are Stoking Hate And Violence After UnitedHealthcare CEO’s Killing
item.description: The shooting of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO has inspired fake accounts in foreign countries to post extreme takes.

item.title: New Smartphone AI Is Great, But What About Dealing With Smartphone Waste?
item.description: MIT folks are looking at solutions for recovery and reuse of these important endpoint devices.
